paragraph.paragraph: The Debugging property page in the Configuration Properties folder contains the following properties:

Start Application
Specifies the command for launching the program you are debugging. This property is automatically written and saved to the "per-user" file (.eeuser) for your project whenever you save your project or close it without saving.

Working Directory
Specifies the working directory of the program being debugged. This property is automatically written and saved to the "per-user" file (.eeuser) for your project whenever you save your project or close it without saving.

Command Line Arguments
Specifies arguments for the Start Application property. This property is automatically written and saved to the "per-user" file (.eeuser) for your project whenever you save your project or close it without saving.

Generate Debug Information
Generate debugging information and place it in the output file(s).
